players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked that Charlie is dead! We need to figure out who did this. Since there's only one mafioso among us three remaining, we should discuss what we observed yesterday."
Diana: "I agree with Alice. We should share what we saw and heard on the day before Charlie's death to help us identify any suspicious behavior or clues."
You: "Bob, you've been very quiet. In a situation like this, silence can seem suspicious. What are your thoughts on who might have killed Charlie?"
Diana: "I believe we should all share any details that might have seemed out of the ordinary to us before Charlie's death. This could help us identify any potential clues or suspicious behavior."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
